section.name: Anathema Hex
section.p: Even as a child your were fascinated by the old tales of the Uttakin - how they swept north across the Violet Ocean, expelling the High King from his throne and laying waste to his country in the name of their faith. There's a race to admire! Your burning ambition is to visit Aku and study the methods of the Soulwatch.
You can play as Anathema, or as a priest with a different name (enter it in the 'Name' field). To begin your adventure, .
